Player History
Traded from Houston to Pittsburgh on 6/3/1965 (Going to HOU: SS B. Pritchard. Going to PIT: P J. Hickman)...
Won World Series with Pittsburgh in 1966...
Pitched PERFECT GAME against New York (N) on 10/1/1967, striking out 6...
Injured on 6/3/1968 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1968, going 3-1, 0.96...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Los Angeles on 1/31/1971 (Going to PIT: P R. Folkers. Going to LA: P J. Hickman)...
Pitched PERFECT GAME against Cincinnati on 9/9/1971, striking out 10...
Won World Series with Los Angeles in 1971...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/2/1976 to a 2-year deal worth $5,160,000 per year...
Drafted in 2nd round, 26th overall pick, by Cincinnati in 1978...
Injured on 5/15/1979 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for 5-6 weeks...
Injured on 6/5/1980 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for full season...
Injured on 7/14/1981 with a Pulled Tricep Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 5/16/1984 with a Spasms Back, out for 3 weeks...
Injured on 7/13/1987 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 5 weeks...
Earned first career win on 9/17/1988...
Injured on 4/19/1990 with a Strained Back, out for 1-2 weeks...

Injured on 9/5/1990 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
